name: Robot Reject
description: This is a late submission to the first game jam I joined. Unfortunately, Unity crashed at the last minute and there were some other issues also. This was so so stressful but just finishing it and making the game work made me very happy. I might(emphasis on might) update this in the future since I have about 50 more ideas I want to put.  Despite the stress, I had lots of fun and I will keep on joining more game jams.
